text: @Mike_Pence Oh please Herr Pence! If you REALLY cared about the people who’ve died of COVID-19 you’d be doing something to actually HELP this country! Meanwhile, you can’t even bring yourself to recommend a mask! Does trumps tiny dick take up too much space in your tiny mouth?
